title: St. Philip Neri Novena
description: St Philip Neri was a Catholic missionary and founder of the Congregation of the Oratory, which includes priests and brothers. Pray this novena for Rome, the U.S. Special Forces, humor and joy, the Philippines, comedians, artists, and writers

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O Holy St Philip Neri, patron saint of joy, you who trusted Scripture‚Äôs promise that the Lord is always at hand and that we need not have anxiety about anything, in your compassion heal our worries and sorrows and lift the burdens from our hearts. We come to you as ones whose hearts swell with abundant love for God and all creation. Hear us, we pray, especially in this need (mention request here‚Ä¶) Keep us safe through your loving intercession, and may the joy of the Holy Spirit which filled your heart, St. Philip, transform our lives and bring us peace. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Philip Neri, Pray for us (repeat 3 times)

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
